Class AlbumsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • eu.tivian.musico.ui.AlbumsFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, LifecycleOwner, ViewModelStoreOwner, SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class AlbumsFragment
extends Fragment
    Displays the albums list.

      • onContextItemSelected

        public boolean onContextItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Depending on option chosen in the context menu, this function either opens the deletion dialog or opens the album editor.
        Overrides:
        onContextItemSelected in class Fragment
        Parameters:
        item - the context menu item that was selected. This value cannot be null.
        Returns:
        return false to allow normal context menu processing to proceed, true to consume it here.

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             @Nullable
                             Intent data)
        If the editing of the album was successful then this function handles saving changes into the database.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class Fragment
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the integer request code originally supplied to Fragment.startActivityForResult(Intent, int) allowing to identify the caller.
        resultCode - the integer result code returned by the child activity through its Activity.setResult(int).
        data - an Intent, which can return result data to the caller.
